item.description: <p>A jealous man killed a former close friend after being driven &quot;crazy&quot; over his girlfriend&#x27;s affair with him.</p>

item.title: Police probe whether protester violence was pre-planned during on-campus meeting
item.description: <p>Police are investigating whether left-wing counter-protesters&#x27; violent actions at a Melbourne rally, where police were pelted by rocks, were pre-planned.</p>

item.title: Adelaide prepares for 93rd annual Christmas Pageant
item.description: <p>Road closures in the central business district are scheduled to commence as early as midnight, with some restrictions remaining in place until 2pm tomorrow.</p>

item.title: Special tribute to young cricketer as teammates prepare to return to competition following tragedy
item.description: <p>A﻿ Melbourne cricket oval has been painted with the initials and cap number of a teenager tragically killed after a training mishap last week, as his teammates prepare to return to the field tomorrow.</p>

item.title: Search for hit-run driver after pair seriously injured crossing the road
item.description: <p>Police have released CCTV vision of a car ﻿travelling near the scene of the crash at the time in the hopes the public can help them identify the driver.</p>

item.title: Dad pens tribute to young children killed in Queensland house fire
item.description: <p>The father of two children killed in a house fire in central Queensland yesterday has paid tribute to his ﻿&quot;little princess&quot; and &quot;best little mate&quot; as police investigate the cause of the blaze.</p>

item.title: Three tradies fight for life after being hit by car outside restaurant in Sydney's west
item.description: <p>The three men were standing outside a business when a car mounted the curb.</p>

item.title: Man arrested after girl, 10, and woman killed in car crash in outback Queensland community
item.description: <p>A car carrying five people ﻿crashed in Doomadgee.</p>

item.title: Property search for SA woman missing for almost 40 years ends
item.description: <p>P﻿olice searched a property near Mount Gambier for the remains of missing woman Margaret Bernie.</p>

item.title: High-rise towers and retail space planned for Gold Coast shopping centre redevelopment
item.description: <p>A significant redevelopment proposal has been lodged for a Gold Coast shopping centre, potentially transforming the ageing site into a mixed-use precinct featuring three residential towers and a revitalised retail space. </p>

item.title: Former NAB employee charged over alleged role in one of the largest fraud schemes in Australian history
item.description: <p>Timotius Donny Sungkar was arrested today by the Financial Crimes Squad after being accused of stealing millions.</p>

item.title: Pair on the run after Gold Coast teen stabbed centimetres from his heart over 'debt'
item.description: <p>Two male offenders remain on the run following a stabbing on ﻿Batchworth Road, Molendinar, about 7.30pm where they came to a house and asked for the 17-year-old Carrara boy by name.</p>

item.title: Prison nurse apologises to family over inmate's death
item.description: <p>Hunt became combative after the seizure and struggled against prison guards who roughly handled him, pinning him down on a mattress, handcuffing him and putting him in a spit hood.</p>

item.title: Inmate mistakenly released from London prison arrested after more than a week of freedom
item.description: <p>A convicted sex offender who was mistakenly released early from a London prison was arrested after more than a week of freedom, police said.</p>

item.title: Trump is ramping up a new effort to convince a skeptical public he can fix affordability worries
item.description: <p>The US President is adjusting his messaging strategy to win over voters who are worried about the cost of living after inflation emerged as a major vulnerability for Trump and Republicans in Tuesday&#x27;s elections.</p>

item.title: 9News - Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world
item.description: Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings

item.title: Multiple explosions shake a mosque in an Indonesian high school and injure 54
item.description: <p>Police said they had recovered a toy submachine gun belonging to the suspect and inscribed with what appeared to be white supremacist slogans but brushed away the notion of a terror attack.</p>
